_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Control your white label Zigbee devices made by Tuya

titleFormatted.en: Effect is [[effect_name]] with speed [[effect_speed]] and color(s) [[effect_color_0]], [[effect_color_1]], [[effect_color_2]], [[effect_color_3]], [[effect_color_4]], [[effect_color_5]], [[effect_color_6]], [[effect_color_7]], [[effect_color_8]]

hint.en: Choose a light pattern and a speed for it. You can also choose what colors the pattern should have, this is not mandatory.
Change the alarm state; sound or silence the alarm
hint.nl: Verander de alarm toestand; luiden of uitschakelen van het alarm
hint.de: Ändern des Alarmstatus; Ein- oder ausschalten des Alarmtons.

title.en: Switch on siren for X Seconds
title.nl: Zet sirene aan voor X seconden
Duur van het alarm in seconden
Zet het volume van de sirene

titleFormatted.nl: Zet het volume van de sirene naar [[siren_volume]]
titleFormatted.de: Einstellen der Lautstärke der Sirene auf [[siren_volume]]

hint.en: Set volume of siren.
hint.nl: Zet het volume van de sirene.

titleFormatted.nl: Stel de alarm melodie in op [[alarm_tune]]

hint.en: Choose the tune of the alarm sound
hint.nl: Kies de melodie die gebruikt wordt bij alarm
hint.de: Wähle die Melodie des Alarmtons aus.

hint.en: This card will trigger when siren is activated.
hint.nl: Deze kaart wordt alleen geactiveerd wanneer de sirene actief is.
hint.de: Diese Karte wird ausgelöst, wenn die Sirene aktiviert wird.

instruction.en: Push the F button on the Christmas Lights controller for aprox 5-10 seconds and release, lights should start to flash slowly.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or power on/off 5 times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink / device starts beeping).

label.en: FUNCTION UNDER DEVELOPMENT, NOT WORKING - Motor moves in reverse direction

instruction.en: Press the reset button 3 times, then press and hold the reset button until the led lights up.
instruction.nl: Druk 3 keer op de reset knop. Druk daarna nog een keer en houd de knop vast tot dat de led blijft branden.

hint.en: The maximum percentage of the curtain that can be opened. This is used to prevent the window from being opened too far.
hint.nl: Het maximale percentage van het raam dat geopend kan worden. Dit wordt gebruikt om te voorkomen dat het gordijn te ver open gaat.

instruction.en: Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Open the device and press the reset button gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Metered Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Measured Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1
Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)
Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)
Min interval before a report is sent to Homey (s)

instruction.en: Push the button for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If nothing happens; put two fingers against the detectors and repeat.

name.en: LCD Temperature, Humidity and Luminance Sensor

instruction.en: Press the reset button on the top of the unit for 10 seconds.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

Set a correction to compensate a humidity offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 1, 
default: 0 [%]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een Luchtvochtigheids verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

instruction.en: Press the button on the side of the unit for 5 seconds.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

hint.nl:

Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

instruction.en: Open the backside of the unit and press the button inside for 5 seconds.

Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.

default: 0 [°C]

instruction.en: Press the button on the side of the unit for 5 seconds.

instruction.en: Push the setup button on the side of the device for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press the reset button for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks.
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold the reset button for 6 seconds. When the indicator light flashes it is in pairing mode.
instruction.nl: Druk 6 seconden op de reset knop. Wacht tot de led gaat knipperen.

instruction.en: Four tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button combined with 1 channel button for 10 seconds (the LED should blink blue).
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press and hold the button inside the battery compartment for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
instruction.it: Tenere premuto il pulsante all'interno del vano batteria per cicrca 5 secondi finchè il LED non lampeggia rapidamente.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

default: 0 [°C]

default: 0 [%]

hint.en: Set the volume of the Alarm sound
Set the duration of the time the siren will sound its alarm music
hint.nl: Pas de tijd aan dat de sirene zijn alarm geluid laat horen
hint.de: Stellt die Zeitdauer ein, während der die Sirene Alarmton erklingt

hint.en: Choose the tune of the alarm sound
hint.nl: Kies de melodie die gebruikt wordt bij alarm
hint.de: Wählt die Melodie des Alarmtons aus.

instruction.en: Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Ensure the indicator light is flashing. If the indicatore light isn't flashing: press and hold the reset button for 5 seconds until the indicator light starts to flashing.
instruction.it: Assicurarsi che l'indicatore lampeggi. Se l'indicatore non lampegga: tenere premuto il pulsante di reset per 5 secondi finchè l'indicatore non inizia a lampeggiare.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.
hint.it: Quest'impostazione determina la soglia alla quale l'allarme di batteria scarica viene dato

instruction.en: Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Press the reset button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Press the reset button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Push a pin gently into the reset hole on the backside of the unit for aprox 10 seconds until the led on the front blinks rapidly.
Press the setup button for approx 10 seconds to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink).
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

Press the button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Press the left button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking). A tile for each button will be created.

Press the button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
